FuncDef: This command is used to create an arbiter within the context oftier 1ortier 2. An arbiter is a child policer bandwidth control object that manages the throughput of a set of child policers. An arbiter allows child policers or other arbiters to parent to one of eight strict levels. Each arbiter is itself parented to either another tiered arbiter or to therootarbiter.

ParaDef.Info: Any unique name within the policy. Up to 31 arbiters may be created.
